channel.title: Help is greatly apreciated!
channel.description:
[center]Sorry for asking such a dumb question, :| but I have recently got into making servers and im trying to learn as much as I can, but at these 2 points I get stuck:
1. How do I set a client to go onto a different IP address, for example if the client is set to log onto 123.no-ip.org, how do i change it to make it go onto 456.no-ip.org?
2. How do I edit the welcome message, or any message/info on the server?
Help is greatly apreciated. [/center]

item.title: Help is greatly apreciated!
item.dc:creator: @Robban1 Robban1
item.description:
@Robban1 wrote:

  1. Search In Client.Java (CTRL+F) For THe Ip(123.no-ip.org) And just change it.
  2. Search For the old welcome message like: Welcome To Moparscape!
  3. For more help pm me

Read full topic
